totalTime.description: Total time. It is usually computed by the control models and then this value is ignored (for example from number of cycles in a CCCV protocol or for discharge and charge protocol).

timeStepDuration.description: Length of the time step. The solution is computed for every time step.

numberOfTimeSteps.description: Number of time steps. If timeStepDuration is not given, we use this number to compute it, using  total time. The default number of time step values is 100.

numberOfRampupSteps.description: if we use rampup, we use at the start time intervals that increases geometrically until we reach the time step target, see function rampupTimesteps.
